title: 30 Min Wait Timer... Cause of banning screen?
body:
Ok... riot... w... t... Flibbidy is going on with this wait timer... 
I literally get into a champ select and... uh.... yeah... BASICLY
it Freezes on the Banning phase... I'm really tired of this happening and getting 
a Wait timer for it. I literally just want to play a few games.
I don't know WHAT is going on but I don't think I deserve this wait timer. with 
how many times it froze on banning phase. its getting very tiresome.
and i'd like some justice for once.{{item:3901}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you received an escalated [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) timer.  The best way to recover from this is to resolve what's consistently causing you to freeze.  I recommend trying [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case of pc stress, but test it in a custom game.  

Otherwise, your network might be unstable and causing you to lose sync from champion select.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix that up.  Even if it's unintended, dodging causes delays from others player getting into a game.
